title: Ellsworth Man Arrested in Accidental Shooting
content:
Police in Ellsworth are investigating what they believe was an accidental shooting Saturday.
They were called to a home on Mariaville Road around 5 PM.
Police say 47-year-old Lawrence Romer of Ellsworth shot a 46-year-old female–Romer claims it was by accident.
The victim was taken to Maine Coast Memorial Hospital, then LifeFlighted to Eastern Maine Medical Center, where she was treated for a non-life-threatening head wound.
She’s since been released.
Romer was arrested and charged with aggravated assault and reckless conduct with a dangerous weapon.
He was taken to the Hancock County Jail.
We’re told Romer and the victim were friends and she was visiting him at his home.
